abstract: A centuries-old crossroads for East-West trade now hopes to be the same for photography. Later this month, Turkey's second-largest city will host the first international Bursa Photo Festival.
snippet: A centuries-old crossroads for East-West trade now hopes to be the same for photography. Later this month, Turkey's second-largest city will host the first international Bursa Photo Festival.
lead_paragraph: For more than six centuries, the bazaars of Bursa, Turkey, have been a meeting point of East and West - between Europe and Asia. The ancient trading routes known as the Silk Road passed through the shops in Bursa, where you can still buy silk, spices and handcrafted gold jewelry.

headline.main: Bringing Turkish Photography to the World Stage
